thread.title: Want Luxury Hotel Discounts? Stock Up at Costco

author: Teresa Rivas
title: Want Luxury Hotel Discounts? Stock Up at Costco
text:
WHEELING your supersize grocery cart, stuffed with a 30-roll pack of toilet paper and 20 plastic containers of organic hummus, around a vast, windowless warehouse can really remind you that you need a vacation. Luckily, you can pick one up on your next Costco run, too. 

Bargain holiday shoppers have long gravitated to Costco Wholesale for family-oriented travel packages: a whirl in Disney World, an Alaskan cruise, a week at an all-inclusive Mexican beach resort. The packages often bundle components of the trip, like theme...
